EmailTemplate.name: Turbofest London 2015.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbofest London 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir or Madam}}: It is my pleasure to cordially invite you to VMTurbo’s First Annual Turbofest London! <http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite> This afternoon meeting and evening reception will be held Thursday, March 19, 2015 at the Andaz Liverpool Street Hotel in London. Hear from our customer Keynote Ian Penny, Managing Director and Head of Distributed Technology at Barclays and member of our Technology Steering Council <http://info.vmturbo.com/G2I0Hu10ni6zZ0gg0000FZb>, as he discusses "Infrastructure as Code" and the need for a control plane in the modern cloud-architected data center. This exclusive event will also feature discussions on OpenStack, SDN, engineering and managing scale out applications as well as future trends in cloud and virtualization - including an inside look at the 2015 VMTurbo Roadmap. You can register here <http://vmturbo.com/register-for-turbofest-london?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbofest_London&utm_content=invite>, and a VMTurbo executive will also contact you to address any questions you may have. I hope you will attend this exciting event; it will be one to remember. Sincerely, J. Benjamin H. Nye Chief Executive Officer VMTurbo, Inc.
500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
